creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
medium: Assemblage of torn newspaper clippings, photocopies, broken green glass bottle, human hair, cigarette butts, matches, with cigarette holes and singe marks, mounted to mat board
provenance: The artist, Santa Fe, N.M.; [Ryan Lee Gallery, New York, sold to Mersky May 2, 2017]; Robert B. Mersky, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2022.
text: Assemblage of various found materials, including torn newspaper clippings, photocopies, broken green glass bottle, human hair, cigarette butts, matches, and cigarette holes and singe marks, with narrative content relating to the abuse and murder of a six-year-old girl at the hands of her mother.
title: All-y All-y in Free
